headline: APP Stock Declines 22.5% in a Month: Should You Buy the Dip?
summary: APP slides 22.5% in a month, but Axon-led AI scalability, e-commerce expansion and surging profits suggest the pullback may mask structural growth.

headline: Northcoast Upgrades Axon (AXON) to Buy With $742 Price Target
summary: Axon Enterprise Inc. (NASDAQ:AXON) is one of the best future stocks to buy for the long term. On January 6, Northcoast analyst Keith Housum upgraded Axon to Buy from Neutral, while setting a $742 price target on the shares. Earlier on December 17, Morgan Stanley analyst Meta Marshall lowered the firm’s price target on Axon […]
